name: Erza Scarlet - Nakagami Armor
description:
As part of the January 2022 release for my Patreon campaign, I made a model of Erza Scarlet in her Nakagami Armor, from the Fairy Tail anime series. She's ready for 3D printing and comes in a 1:10 scale, on two different versions: SFW and NSFW.

She also comes in a 32 mm version.

Pre-supported versions included.

If you like my work and want to support me, or if you want to get a constant stream of sexy characters for 3dprinting for a signature price, please consider pledging for my Patreon page:

http://www.patreon.com/torridaminis
